subject: Arena Football
lead_paragraph: Aaron Garcia threw seven touchdown passes — four to Chris Anthony — and ran for a score in the Dragons’ 63-34 victory against the Grand Rapids Rampage in Uniondale, N.Y.
snippet: Aaron Garcia threw seven touchdown passes — four to Chris Anthony — and ran for a score in the Dragons’ 63-34 victory against the Grand Rapids Rampage in Uniondale, N.Y.
